body:
id like to keep this short and simple, farewell avicus. its been a true pleasure ill never forget, but as my life progresses throughout time, its just not fair to you guys for my obsolete absence. i took the courage to leave. i dont plan to come back, but id just like to say, thank you all (: 

-dubby.

replies.body: Thanks for the time we had together as Senior Mods :)

replies.body: One of the first few members of the community I ever talked to, eleven months ago; one of the first few I chanced a unique, specific type of affinity for; one of the first few I learned was admirably musically knowledgeable (competent, rather), and for those reasons — among others unnamed — you were a personal favorite of mine, as player, staff, and person alike. Au revoir...

Au revoir...
